attributes.title: Why is this so bad??
attributes.review: I can’t even go 1 second without crashing on my phone and it makes me lose so much charge. It takes up too much storage and the quality can’t behave correctly and I hate that

attributes.title: Needs a lot of work
attributes.review: The app works very slow and won’t stop glitching, the layout is also very confusing to use. Overall there is too many this wrong with the app. I’m very disappointed with it.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It would lag constantly, and continue to make my phone bug out, I do not appreciate this app at all, it doesn’t help you at all, I never received any news from this app. I am deeply disappointed.

attributes.title: Worst app on the whole app store🤢
attributes.review: Hey Apple u guys should most DEFINITELY take down this app mainly because the “president” is literally a rapist and a racist like pick a struggle🙄 he also upsetting me and my home girls cause it’s like if u can’t stay in America without having a fascist run it where the hell can u go 🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️

attributes.title: ✨Orange Screen✨
attributes.review: Every time I open the app I’m greeted with an 🍊orange🍊screen. I can’t seem to get past it. Sometimes when I open it I hear a 🌟pervert🌟 too! Can someone fix this app to have a better president on it? Like 🌸James A. Garfield?🌸 Please get rid of the app with the horrible orange screen!✨🧚🏻‍♀️🌸💕

attributes.title: I am disgusted
attributes.review: I tried to download this app at the begging of him term and it just now got installed. Then the app proceeds to give me death threats if I don’t vote for him, after that it just goes to a picture of his micro penis for about ten minute,I haven’t been able to sleep since then .👎🏻🧚🏻🧜🏻‍♀️🤢

attributes.title: Never again
attributes.review: This app is made so horribly. It constantly glitches and lags, and has slowed my phone down immensely since i downloaded it. At this point, if Trump cant even make a good app for a his supporters, then I can no longer support him.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I am a Hispanic and I downloaded the app to see what Trump was up to and words cannot describe how terrible I feel after what I saw. First of all this app took a whole day to install. Secondly as soon as I open the app it displays a brick wall and tells me “no beaners allowed🍊🇺🇸” 😔

attributes.title: I'm so disappointed
attributes.review: I wanted to support our conservative lord and savior Donald Trump but the app was unable to solve any of my grievances. It barely functions and I cannot find ways to support Trump through this platform. Terrible work; the fronts made my child sob for hours. 0/5 Stars.

attributes.title: An angry user
attributes.review: The MINUTE I opened the app my hole phone crashed and I was so sad and upset I had to let it sit for like three days for it to drain the battery and  hope it came back on. This app need to be taken down so this doesn’t happen to others!!!!!
